Posted By: Dargenom (5/27/2012 3:32:35 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
>>Opening hand with this, one swamp, and Emrakul or other big nasty like Blightsteel colossus. Turn one, don't play anything, discard the biggie, Second turn, pull the biggie, third turn wreck face. <<  
  
Yes to Blightsteel, no to Emrakul. Check him out, if he hits the graveyard, you shuffle him back into your library. You need cards that are fatties that will stay in the graveyard (so no [Progenitus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Progenitus), either). I recommend [Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur) and [Sphinx of the Steel Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx of the Steel Wind).
posts.html:
>>Opening hand with this, one swamp, and Emrakul or other big nasty like Blightsteel colossus. Turn one, don't play anything, discard the biggie, Second turn, pull the biggie, third turn wreck face. <<

Yes to Blightsteel, no to Emrakul. Check him out, if he hits the graveyard, you shuffle him back into your library. You need cards that are fatties that will stay in the graveyard (so no Progenitus, either). I recommend Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur and Sphinx of the Steel Wind.
